meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful sarsnet gown to the ball.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room were made of delicate sarsnet.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the sarsnet pillow and purred contentedly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and smooth as a sarsnet scarf.
meanings.sent5: The touch of sarsnet against her skin was like a gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: To cover or dress with sarsnet.
meanings.sent1: She decided to sarsnet the chair to give it a new look.
meanings.sent2: The tailor sarsneted the dress beautifully for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally sarsneted himself with glitter while crafting.
meanings.sent4: Her words sarsneted the room with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The flowers sarsneted the garden with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A garment made of sarsnet fabric.
meanings.sent1: The sarsnet dress shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate details of the sarsnet robe.
meanings.sent3: The sarsnet coat kept her warm during the chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: His words wrapped around her like a protective sarsnet cloak.
meanings.sent5: The sarsnet outfit made her feel elegant and graceful.
